answers.answer: Good question.  Not that I have seen so far in the literature.  That is unless you develop diabetes as a result.  Diabetes can damage your eye significantly.  Make sure you are on eye vitamins if you have macular degeneration.  Discuss with your ophthalmologist.HV

question: HiI have a horrible sugar habit.Could that have an effect onmy vision and could it makemacular degeneration worse.Thank you,starr363
title: macular degeneration
